41 template <typename T, typename Range, typename OpResult>
42 class TensorInterface;

46 void remap(detail::TensorInterface<T, Range_, OpResult>&, T* const,
47  const Index&, const Index&);

50  const Index&, const Index&);

52 void remap(detail::TensorInterface<T, Range_, OpResult>&, T* const,
53  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&,
54  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&);

57  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&,
58  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&);

60 namespace detail {
61 
63 
77 template <typename T, typename R, typename OpResult>
78 class TensorInterface {
79  public:
80  typedef TensorInterface<T, R, OpResult>
81  TensorInterface_;
82  typedef R range_type;
83  typedef typename range_type::size_type size_type;
84  typedef
85  typename std::remove_const<T>::type value_type;
86  typedef typename std::add_lvalue_reference<T>::type
87  reference;
88  typedef
89  typename std::add_lvalue_reference<typename std::add_const<T>::type>::type
90  const_reference;
91  typedef typename std::add_pointer<T>::type pointer;
92  typedef typename std::add_pointer<typename std::add_const<T>::type>::type
93  const_pointer;
94  typedef typename std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
95  typedef typename detail::numeric_type<value_type>::type
96  numeric_type;
97  typedef typename detail::scalar_type<value_type>::type
98  scalar_type;
99 
100  typedef OpResult result_tensor;
102 
103  private:
104  template <typename X>
105  using numeric_t = typename TiledArray::detail::numeric_type<X>::type;
106 
107  template <typename, typename, typename>
108  friend class TensorInterface;
109 
110  template <typename U, typename Range_, typename OpResult_, typename Index>
111  friend void TiledArray::remap(detail::TensorInterface<U, Range_, OpResult_>&,
112  U* const, const Index&, const Index&);
113  template <typename U, typename Range_, typename OpResult_, typename Index>
114  friend void TiledArray::remap(
115  detail::TensorInterface<const U, Range_, OpResult_>&, U* const,
116  const Index&, const Index&);
117  template <typename U, typename Range_, typename OpResult_>
118  friend void TiledArray::remap(detail::TensorInterface<U, Range_, OpResult_>&,
119  U* const,
120  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&,
121  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&);
122  template <typename U, typename Range_, typename OpResult_>
123  friend void TiledArray::remap(
124  detail::TensorInterface<const U, Range_, OpResult_>&, U* const,
125  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&,
126  const std::initializer_list<std::size_t>&);
127 
128  range_type range_;
129  pointer data_;
130 
131  public:
133  TensorInterface() = delete;
134  ~TensorInterface() = default;
135  TensorInterface(const TensorInterface_&) = default;
136  TensorInterface(TensorInterface_&&) = default;
137  TensorInterface_& operator=(const TensorInterface_&) = delete;
138  TensorInterface_& operator=(TensorInterface_&&) = delete;
139 
141 
144  template <typename U, typename UOpResult,
145  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<
146  typename TensorInterface<U, R, UOpResult>::pointer,
147  pointer>::value>::type* = nullptr>
148  TensorInterface(const TensorInterface<U, R, UOpResult>& other)
149  : range_(other.range_), data_(other.data_) {}
150 
152 
155  template <typename U, typename UOpResult,
156  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<
157  typename TensorInterface<U, R, UOpResult>::pointer,
158  pointer>::value>::type* = nullptr>
159  TensorInterface(TensorInterface<U, R, UOpResult>&& other)
160  : range_(std::move(other.range_)), data_(other.data_) {
161  other.data_ = nullptr;
162  }
163 
165 
168  TensorInterface(const range_type& range, pointer data)
169  : range_(range), data_(data) {
170  TA_ASSERT(data);
171  }
172 
174 
177  TensorInterface(range_type&& range, pointer data)
178  : range_(std::move(range)), data_(data) {
179  TA_ASSERT(data);
180  }
181 
182  template <typename T1, typename std::enable_if<
183  detail::is_tensor<T1>::value>::type* = nullptr>
184  TensorInterface_& operator=(const T1& other) {
185  TA_ASSERT(data_ != other.data());
186 
187  detail::inplace_tensor_op([](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
188  const numeric_t<T1> arg) { result = arg; },
189  *this, other);
190 
191  return *this;
192  }
193 
195 
197  const range_type& range() const { return range_; }
198 
200 
202  size_type size() const { return range_.volume(); }
203 
205 
207  pointer data() const { return data_; }
208 
210 
213  const_reference operator[](const size_type index) const {
214  TA_ASSERT(range_.includes(index));
215  return data_[range_.ordinal(index)];
216  }
217 
219 
222  reference operator[](const size_type index) {
223  TA_ASSERT(range_.includes(index));
224  return data_[range_.ordinal(index)];
225  }
226 
228 
231  template <typename... Index>
232  reference operator()(const Index&... idx) {
233  TA_ASSERT(range_.includes(idx...));
234  return data_[range_.ordinal(idx...)];
235  }
236 
238 
241  template <typename... Index>
242  const_reference operator()(const Index&... idx) const {
243  TA_ASSERT(range_.includes(idx...));
244  return data_[range_.ordinal(idx...)];
245  }
246 
248 
250  constexpr bool empty() const { return false; }
251 
253 
255  void swap(TensorInterface_& other) {
256  range_.swap(other.range_);
257  std::swap(data_, other.data_);
258  }
259 
261 
265  template <typename Index>
266  TensorInterface_& shift_to(const Index& bound_shift) {
267  range_.inplace_shift(bound_shift);
268  return *this;
269  }
270 
272 
276  template <typename Index>
277  result_tensor shift(const Index& bound_shift) const {
278  return result_tensor(range_.shift(bound_shift), data_);
279  }
280 
281  // Generic vector operations
282 
284 
291  template <typename Right, typename Op,
292  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
293  result_tensor binary(const Right& right, Op&& op) const {
294  // return result_tensor(*this, right, op);
295  result_tensor new_tensor(detail::clone_range(*this));
296  detail::tensor_init(op, new_tensor, *this, right);
297  return new_tensor;
298  }
299 
301 
309  template <typename Right, typename Op,
310  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
311  result_tensor binary(const Right& right, Op&& op,
312  const Permutation& perm) const {
313  // return result_tensor(*this, right, op, perm);
314  result_tensor new_tensor(perm * this->range());
315  detail::tensor_init(op, perm, new_tensor, *this, right);
316  return new_tensor;
317  }
318 
320 
331  template <typename Right, typename Op,
332  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
333  TensorInterface_& inplace_binary(const Right& right, Op&& op) {
334  detail::inplace_tensor_op(op, *this, right);
335  return *this;
336  }
337 
339 
345  template <typename Op>
346  result_tensor unary(Op&& op) const {
347  // return result_tensor(*this, op);
348  result_tensor new_tensor(detail::clone_range(*this));
349  detail::tensor_init(op, new_tensor, *this);
350  return new_tensor;
351  }
352 
354 
362  template <typename Op>
363  result_tensor unary(Op&& op, const Permutation& perm) const {
364  // return result_tensor(*this, op, perm);
365  result_tensor new_tensor(perm * this->range());
366  detail::tensor_init(op, perm, new_tensor, *this);
367  return new_tensor;
368  }
369 
371 
376  template <typename Op>
377  TensorInterface_& inplace_unary(Op&& op) {
378  detail::inplace_tensor_op(op, *this);
379  return *this;
380  }
381 
382  // permute operation
383  // construct a permuted copy of this tensor
384  result_tensor permute(const Permutation& perm) const {
385  auto op = [](const T& arg) { return arg; };
386  result_tensor new_tensor(perm * this->range());
387  TiledArray::detail::tensor_init(op, perm, new_tensor, *this);
388  return new_tensor;
389  }
390 
391  // Scale operation
392 
394 
399  template <typename Scalar, typename std::enable_if<
400  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
401  result_tensor scale(const Scalar factor) const {
402  return unary(
403  [factor](const numeric_type a) -> numeric_type { return a * factor; });
404  }
405 
407 
413  template <typename Scalar, typename std::enable_if<
414  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
415  result_tensor scale(const Scalar factor, const Permutation& perm) const {
416  return unary(
417  [factor](const numeric_type a) -> numeric_type { return a * factor; },
418  perm);
419  }
420 
422 
426  template <typename Scalar, typename std::enable_if<
427  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
428  TensorInterface_& scale_to(const Scalar factor) {
429  return inplace_unary(
430  [factor](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res) { res *= factor; });
431  }
432 
433  // Addition operations
434 
436 
441  template <typename Right,
442  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
443  result_tensor add(const Right& right) const {
444  return binary(
445  right,
446  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
447  return l + r;
448  });
449  }
450 
452 
458  template <typename Right,
459  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
460  result_tensor add(const Right& right, const Permutation& perm) const {
461  return binary(
462  right,
463  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
464  return l + r;
465  },
466  perm);
467  }
468 
470 
477  template <
478  typename Right, typename Scalar,
479  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
480  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
481  result_tensor add(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) const {
482  return binary(right,
483  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
484  -> numeric_type { return (l + r) * factor; });
485  }
486 
488 
496  template <
497  typename Right, typename Scalar,
498  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
499  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
500  result_tensor add(const Right& right, const Scalar factor,
501  const Permutation& perm) const {
502  return binary(
503  right,
504  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
505  -> numeric_type { return (l + r) * factor; },
506  perm);
507  }

514  result_tensor add(const numeric_type value) const {
515  return unary(
516  [value](const numeric_type a) -> numeric_type { return a + value; });
517  }
518 
520 
525  result_tensor add(const numeric_type value, const Permutation& perm) const {
526  return unary(
527  [value](const numeric_type a) -> numeric_type { return a + value; },
528  perm);
529  }

536  template <typename Right,
537  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
538  TensorInterface_& add_to(const Right& right) {
539  return inplace_binary(right, [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT l,
540  const numeric_t<Right> r) { l += r; });
541  }
542 
544 
550  template <
551  typename Right, typename Scalar,
552  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
553  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
554  TensorInterface_& add_to(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) {
555  return inplace_binary(
556  right, [factor](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT l,
557  const numeric_t<Right> r) { (l += r) *= factor; });
558  }
559 
561 
564  TensorInterface_& add_to(const numeric_type value) {
565  return inplace_unary(
566  [value](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res) { res += value; });
567  }

569  // Subtraction operations

572 
577  template <typename Right,
578  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
579  result_tensor subt(const Right& right) const {
580  return binary(
581  right,
582  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
583  return l - r;
584  });
585  }
586 
588 
594  template <typename Right,
595  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
596  result_tensor subt(const Right& right, const Permutation& perm) const {
597  return binary(
598  right,
599  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
600  return l - r;
601  },
602  perm);
603  }
604 
606 
613  template <
614  typename Right, typename Scalar,
615  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
616  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
617  result_tensor subt(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) const {
618  return binary(right,
619  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
620  -> numeric_type { return (l - r) * factor; });
621  }
622 
624 
632  template <
633  typename Right, typename Scalar,
634  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
635  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
636  result_tensor subt(const Right& right, const Scalar factor,
637  const Permutation& perm) const {
638  return binary(
639  right,
640  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
641  -> numeric_type { return (l - r) * factor; },
642  perm);
643  }

646 
649  result_tensor subt(const numeric_type value) const { return add(-value); }
650 
652 
657  result_tensor subt(const numeric_type value, const Permutation& perm) const {
658  return add(-value, perm);
659  }

668  TensorInterface_& subt_to(const Right& right) {

670  const numeric_t<Right> r) { l -= r; });
671  }

684  TensorInterface_& subt_to(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) {
685  return inplace_binary(

687  const numeric_t<Right> r) { (l -= r) *= factor; });
688  }

693  TensorInterface_& subt_to(const numeric_type value) { return add_to(-value); }

703  template <typename Right,
704  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
705  result_tensor mult(const Right& right) const {
706  return binary(
707  right,
708  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
709  return l * r;
710  });
711  }
712 
714 
720  template <typename Right,
721  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
722  result_tensor mult(const Right& right, const Permutation& perm) const {
723  return binary(
724  right,
725  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
726  return l * r;
727  },
728  perm);
729  }

732 
739  template <
740  typename Right, typename Scalar,
741  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
742  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
743  result_tensor mult(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) const {
744  return binary(right,
745  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
746  -> numeric_type { return (l * r) * factor; });
747  }

758  template <
759  typename Right, typename Scalar,
760  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
761  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
762  result_tensor mult(const Right& right, const Scalar factor,
763  const Permutation& perm) const {
764  return binary(
765  right,
766  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
767  -> numeric_type { return (l * r) * factor; },
768  perm);

776  template <typename Right,
777  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
778  TensorInterface_& mult_to(const Right& right) {
779  return inplace_binary(right, [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT l,
780  const numeric_t<Right> r) { l *= r; });
781  }

790  template <
791  typename Right, typename Scalar,
792  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
793  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
794  TensorInterface_& mult_to(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) {
795  return inplace_binary(
796  right, [factor](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT l,
797  const numeric_t<Right> r) { (l *= r) *= factor; });
798  }

800  // Negation operations
801 
803 
805  result_tensor neg() const {
806  return unary([](const numeric_type r) -> numeric_type { return -r; });
807  }
808 
810 
813  result_tensor neg(const Permutation& perm) const {
814  return unary([](const numeric_type l) -> numeric_type { return -l; }, perm);
815  }
816 
818 
820  TensorInterface_& neg_to() {
821  return inplace_unary([](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT l) { l = -l; });
822  }
823 
825 
828  result_tensor conj() const { return scale(conj_op()); }
829 
831 
836  template <typename Scalar, typename std::enable_if<
837  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
838  result_tensor conj(const Scalar factor) const {
839  return scale(conj_op(factor));
840  }
841 
843 
847  result_tensor conj(const Permutation& perm) const {
848  return scale(conj_op(), perm);
849  }
850 
852 
858  template <typename Scalar, typename std::enable_if<
859  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
860  result_tensor conj(const Scalar factor, const Permutation& perm) const {
861  return scale(conj_op(factor), perm);
862  }
863 
865 
867  TensorInterface_& conj_to() { return scale_to(conj_op()); }
868 
870 
874  template <typename Scalar, typename std::enable_if<
875  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
876  TensorInterface_& conj_to(const Scalar factor) {
877  return scale_to(conj_op(factor));
878  }
879 
881 
892  template <typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp>
893  numeric_type reduce(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op,
894  const numeric_type identity) const {
895  return detail::tensor_reduce(reduce_op, join_op, identity, *this);
896  }
897 
899 
911  template <typename Right, typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp,
912  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
913  numeric_type reduce(const Right& other, ReduceOp&& reduce_op,
914  JoinOp&& join_op, const numeric_type identity) const {
915  return detail::tensor_reduce(reduce_op, join_op, identity, *this, other);
916  }
917 
919 
921  numeric_type sum() const {
922  auto sum_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
923  const numeric_type arg) { res += arg; };
924  return reduce(sum_op, sum_op, numeric_type(0));
925  }
926 
928 
930  numeric_type product() const {
931  auto mult_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
932  const numeric_type arg) { res *= arg; };
933  return reduce(mult_op, mult_op, numeric_type(1));
934  }
935 
937 
939  scalar_type squared_norm() const {
940  auto square_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
941  const numeric_type arg) {
942  res += TiledArray::detail::norm(arg);
943  };
944  auto sum_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res, const scalar_type arg) {
945  res += arg;
946  };
947  return reduce(square_op, sum_op, numeric_type(0));
948  }
949 
951 
955  template <typename ResultType = numeric_type>
956  ResultType norm() const {
957  return std::sqrt(static_cast<ResultType>(squared_norm()));
958  }
959 
961 
963  numeric_type min() const {
964  auto min_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
965  const numeric_type arg) { res = std::min(res, arg); };
966  return reduce(min_op, min_op, std::numeric_limits<numeric_type>::max());
967  }
968 
970 
972  numeric_type max() const {
973  auto max_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
974  const numeric_type arg) { res = std::max(res, arg); };
975  return reduce(max_op, max_op, std::numeric_limits<numeric_type>::min());
976  }
977 
979 
981  numeric_type abs_min() const {
982  auto abs_min_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
983  const numeric_type arg) {
984  res = std::min(res, std::abs(arg));
985  };
986  auto min_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
987  const numeric_type arg) { res = std::min(res, arg); };
988  return reduce(abs_min_op, min_op, std::numeric_limits<numeric_type>::max());
989  }
990 
992 
994  numeric_type abs_max() const {
995  auto abs_max_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
996  const numeric_type arg) {
997  res = std::max(res, std::abs(arg));
998  };
999  auto max_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1000  const numeric_type arg) { res = std::max(res, arg); };
1001  return reduce(abs_max_op, max_op, numeric_type(0));
1002  }
1003 
1005 
1009  template <typename Right,
1010  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1011  numeric_type dot(const Right& other) const {
1012  auto mult_add_op = [](numeric_type& res, const numeric_type l,
1013  const numeric_t<Right> r) { res += l * r; };
1014  auto add_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1015  const numeric_type value) { res += value; };
1016  return reduce(other, mult_add_op, add_op, numeric_type(0));
1017  }
1018 
1025  template <typename Right,
1026  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1027  numeric_type inner_product(const Right& other) const {
1028  auto mult_add_op = [](numeric_type& res, const numeric_type l,
1029  const numeric_t<Right> r) {
1030  res += TiledArray::detail::inner_product(l, r);
1031  };
1032  auto add_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1033  const numeric_type value) { res += value; };
1034  return reduce(other, mult_add_op, add_op, numeric_type(0));
1035  }
1036 
1037 }; // class TensorInterface
1038 
1039 } // namespace detail
1040 } // namespace TiledArray
1041 
1042 #endif // TILEDARRAY_TENSOR_TENSOR_VIEW_H__INCLUDED
